Sidebar with logo (ANDO JV) separated from main content area. No overlap detected
Title 'Izbrannoye' has visible letter-spacing, clean typography

verdict.notes: Badge on catalog shows dark/black background with light text
Logo 'ANDO JV' in sidebar box is properly proportioned, not oversized
Headers DOSTAVKA, OPLATA on Info page have consistent spacing. Categories in sidebar uniform
Sidebar categories (Novoe, Vse Tovary, Verhnyaya, etc.) aligned with filter row (Material, Tsvet, Razmer)
Checkout redirects when cart empty. Info page shows 'besplatnaya' but that's informational, not checkout UI

verdict.description: Right side shows delivery name, not price
verdict.notes: Cannot access checkout page - redirects to catalog when cart is empty
Cannot verify - checkout page inaccessible with empty cart
Registration page /auth/register returns 404. Login page shows only login form, no registration blocks
Cannot verify - checkout page inaccessible with empty cart
Catalog products aligned in grid, proper baseline alignment
Lookbook photos (Osen/Zima 2025, Vesna 2025) bottom-aligned on same baseline
Info page sections (DOSTAVKA, OPLATA) properly aligned
Support button visible on mobile ('Podder...' bottom right). Desktop may use different placement or hover trigger

issues: CHECKOUT TASKS (DOR-8,9,10,12): Page redirects to /catalog when cart is empty - need product in cart to test
REGISTRATION (DOR-11): Page /auth/register returns 404 - registration flow may have changed or been removed

test_limitations: Server response is slow (up to 120s for some pages)
Checkout page requires items in cart (server-side check)
Product pages could not be loaded during test session
recommendations: Manually test checkout by adding product through UI
Verify registration flow exists or document its removal
Consider allowing checkout access for QA even with empty cart
Product API may need investigation - links exist but products don't load
